name: Barkeep Simulator - STAFFS GAMES JAM 2022
description:
Barkeeping Game – Group 69

 

Our submission for the Game Jam is a basic barkeeping game, in which the player would produce drinks from a variety of ingredients to serve customers. This would include alcohol, mixers, toppings and ice, and customers would request one of a variety of options and combinations. Gradually, subtle story elements would be introduced via the use of recurring characters, that the player can either assist or hinder, as well as a wider variety of ingredients and harder combinations.

Currently in-game are extremely basic animations, which display how items would quickly move around the environment while playing, as well as a blockout for the surrounding environment, including seating areas, shelves and lighting.

 

Produced by:

  • -Trinity Harvey
  • -Safiya Hay
  • -Joe ‘Avery’ Chamberlain
  • -Bertas Jasiunas Hempson
  • -Joey Wild
